title: Neon Watch Face Hulk Glow

descriptionHTML:
Neon Android Wear Watch Face in Neon Green
TRASHY watchface lights
- Android Wear 5.0.1 required -

Do you want the original watch from Hulk on your Moto360, well here it is ;-)
Nice sun reflexions on your watchface, looks like a premium watchface
ONLY FOR MEN
Simulates sun reflexion so it appears as a real watch with nice animations! Round or Rectangle the Watch supports both. Now with Burn-In protection for OLED screens and low bit screens are also supported!

New Customization Options
- Ambient Brightness (Save Battery!!!)
- Show / Hide Name
- Show / Hide Date
- Hand Animation

compatible devices:
Motorola Moto360, LG G WATCH R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear LIVE, SmartWatch 3, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony 3 Android wear watches
The App will work with ANY smartwatch that runs Android Wear 5.01!

install:
After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch
Long press on the smartwatch clock, then select HULK

Suggestions to improve the watch? Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best.

Currently our Android wear watchfaces app can be used on the Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony, Moto 360 & ASUS Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live, LG G and all other Android Wear devices. Premium Luxary Watch Clock like Rolex Breitling Rado
comments: Really good, with a few suggestions. This watch face is really good! I have a few suggestions though:  1. Add an option to totally turn off the reflection, so it doesn't appear at all.  2. Add an option for the date where only the number for the day appears (like most other watches).  3. Add an option for all of the background to be pitch black.  4. Extend the green all the way to the very edge in the major tick marks. Right now those tick marks are half green and half white.  Cheers!

I really like the way this watch face looks, however I continue to get Init UI error pop-ups like other reviewers here. It becomes pretty frustrating after awhile. My only other gripe is I wish there was a digital option along side the analog, as well as a battery percentage.  [Using a Moto 360 1st gen]
Init UI error When you first select the face, it pops up an error saying "Init UI error" . I would not expect an error from a paid app.
Looks great. Error on start I get the same ui error on start. Other than that I love the face.
Very nice. Looks very simple and nice on my g watch R
Needs digital time needs digital time
